#summary Interface provided by the plugin's DOM object

Using the `<embed>` element creates a plugin DOM object.  The NaCl plugin object has the following methods:

 * `__urlAsNaClDesc`
 * `__shmFactory`
 * `__socketAddressFactory`
 * `__defaultSocketAddress`
 * `__nullPluginMethod`

It has the following properties:

 * `height`
 * `width`
 * `src`
 * `__moduleReady`
 * `videoUpdateMode`

These methods and properties are hooked up in [http://code.google.com/p/nativeclient/source/browse/trunk/src/native_client/src/trusted/plugin/srpc/plugin.cc plugin/srpc/plugin.cc].
